47 #include <string>
48 #include <stdlib.h>
49 #include <sstream>
50 #include <fstream>
51 #include <chrono>
52 #include <thread>
53 #include <mutex>
54 
55 
56 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
57 #include <math.h>
58 
59 
60 #include "yaml-cpp/yaml.h"
61 
62 
63 #ifdef HAVE_NEW_YAMLCPP
64 // The >> operator disappeared in yaml-cpp 0.5, so this function is
65 // added to provide support for code written under the yaml-cpp 0.3 API.
66 template<typename T>
67 void operator >> (const YAML::Node& node, T& i)
68 {
69  i = node.as<T>();
70 }
71 #endif
72 
73 #include <ros/package.h>
74 #include <XmlRpcValue.h>
75 
76 #include <dynamixel_controller/dynamixel_controller.h>
77 #include <dynamixel_driver/dynamixel_driver.h>
78 
79 
80 using namespace dynamixel_controller;
81 using namespace std;
82 
83 
88 DynamixelController::DynamixelController()
89 {
90  shutting_down_ = false;
91  nh_ = new ros::NodeHandle("~");
92 
93  //load the file containing model info, we're not using the param server here
94  string path = ros::package::getPath("dynamixel_controller");
95  path += "/config/motor_data.yaml";
96 
97  YAML::Node doc;
98 
99  #ifdef HAVE_NEW_YAMLCPP
100  doc = YAML::LoadFile(path);
101  #else
102  ifstream fin(path.c_str());
103  YAML::Parser parser(fin);
104  parser.GetNextDocument(doc);
105  #endif
106 
107  //read in the dynamixel model information from the motor data file
108  for (int i = 0; i < doc.size(); i++)
109  {
110  dynamixelSpec spec;
111 
112  // Load the basic specs of this motor type
113  doc[i]["name"] >> spec.name;
114  doc[i]["model_number"] >> spec.model_number;
115  doc[i]["cpr"] >> spec.cpr;
116  doc[i]["gear_reduction"] >> spec.gear_reduction;
117  doc[i]["torque_ratio"] >> spec.torque_ratio;
118 
119  model_number2specs_[spec.model_number] = spec;
120  }
121 
122 
123  std::string mode;
124  double global_joint_speed;
125  double global_torque_limit;
126  double global_p_gain;
127  double global_i_gain;
128  double global_d_gain;
129 
130  //load all the info from the param server, with defaults
131  nh_->param<double>("publish_rate_", publish_rate_, 50.0);
132  nh_->param<bool>("disable_torque_on_shutdown", stop_motors_on_shutdown_, false);
133  nh_->param<bool>("echo_joint_commands", echo_joint_commands_, false);
134 
135  nh_->param<std::string>("control_mode", mode, "Position");
136  nh_->param<double>("global_joint_speed", global_joint_speed, 1.0);
137  nh_->param<double>("global_torque_limit", global_torque_limit, 1.0);
138  nh_->param<double>("global_p_gain", global_p_gain, -1.0);
139  nh_->param<double>("global_i_gain", global_i_gain, -1.0);
140  nh_->param<double>("global_d_gain", global_d_gain, -1.0);
141 
142  // Set control mode for this run
143  if (!strncmp(mode.c_str(), "Position", 8))
144  {
145  control_type_ = POSITION_CONTROL;
146  }
147  else if (!strncmp(mode.c_str(), "Velocity", 8))
148  {
149  control_type_ = VELOCITY_CONTROL;
150  }
151  else if (!strncmp(mode.c_str(), "Torque", 8))
152  {
153  control_type_ = TORQUE_CONTROL;
154  }
155 
156  // Initialise write state variables
157  write_ready_ = false;
158  first_write_ = true;
159 
160  //Attempt to parse information for each device (port)
161  int num_ports = 0;
162  if (nh_->hasParam("ports"))
163  {
164 
165  //PARSE ARRAY OF PORT INFORMATION
166 
167  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue ports;
168  nh_->getParam("ports", ports);
169  //If there is no servos array in the param server, return
170  if (!ports.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray)
171  {
172  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/missing device information on the param server");
173  ROS_BREAK();
174  }
175 
176 
177  num_ports = ports.size();
178 
179  //For every port, load and verify its information
180  for (int i = 0; i < ports.size(); i++)
181  {
182 
183  portInfo port;
184 
185 
186  /************************* PORT ARGUMENTS *********************/
187 
188 
189  //check if info exists for specified port
190  if (!ports[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct)
191  {
192  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing info-struct for servo index %d", i);
193  ROS_BREAK();
194  }
195 
196 
197  //get port name
198  if (!ports[i]["port_name"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString)
199  {
200  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing port name for port %d", i);
201  ROS_BREAK();
202  }
203  else
204  {
205  port.port_name = static_cast<std::string>(ports[i]["port_name"]);
206  }
207 
208 
209  //get device name
210  if (!ports[i]["device"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString)
211  {
212  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing device name for port %d", i);
213  ROS_BREAK();
214  }
215  else
216  {
217  port.device = static_cast<std::string>(ports[i]["device"]);
218  }
219 
220  //get baud rate
221  if (!ports[i]["baudrate"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeInt)
222  {
223  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing baudrate for port %d", i);
224  ROS_BREAK();
225  }
226  else
227  {
228  port.baudrate = static_cast<int>(ports[i]["baudrate"]);
229  }
230 
231  //get series
232  if (!ports[i]["series"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString)
233  {
234  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing device name for port %d", i);
235  ROS_BREAK();
236  }
237  else
238  {
239  port.series = static_cast<std::string>(ports[i]["series"]);
240  }
241 
242 
243  /************************* Driver initialisation *********************/
244 
245  //Attempt to start driver
246  try
247  {
248  port.driver = new dynamixel_driver::DynamixelDriver(port.device, port.baudrate, port.series);
249  }
250  catch (int n)
251  {
252  ROS_ERROR("Unable to start driver!, code %d", n);
253  ROS_BREAK();
254  }
255 
256  /************************* Dynamixel initialisation *********************/
257 
258  int num_motors = 0;
259 
260  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue servos;
261 
262  //If there is no servos array in the param server, return
263  if (!servos.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray)
264  {
265  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/missing servo information on the param server");
266  ROS_BREAK();
267  }
268  else
269  {
270  servos = ports[i]["servos"];
271  }
272 
273  num_motors = servos.size();
274 
275  //For every servo, load and verify its information
276  for (int j = 0; j < servos.size(); j++)
277  {
278  //store the loaded information in this struct
279  dynamixelInfo info;
280 
281  //check if info exists for specified joint
282  if (!servos[j].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct)
283  {
284  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing info-struct for servo index %d", i);
285  ROS_BREAK();
286  }
287 
288  //get joint id
289  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("id")) || (!servos[j]["id"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeInt) )
290  {
291  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing id for servo index %d", i);
292  ROS_BREAK();
293  }
294  else
295  {
296  //store the servo's ID
297  info.id = static_cast<int>(servos[j]["id"]);
298  }
299 
300  //get joint name
301  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("joint_name")) ||
302  (!servos[j]["joint_name"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString) )
303  {
304  ROS_ERROR("Invalid/Missing joint name for servo index %d, id: %d", i, info.id);
305  ROS_BREAK();
306  }
307  else
308  {
309  //store the servo's corresponding joint name
310  info.joint_name = static_cast<std::string>(servos[j]["joint_name"]);
311 
312  //check this port and all previous ports for duplicate joint names (not allowed as joints are
313  //referred to by name)
314  if ( port.joints.find(info.joint_name) != port.joints.end() )
315  {
316  ROS_ERROR("Cannot have multiple joints with the same name [%s]", info.joint_name.c_str());
317  ROS_BREAK();
318  }
319  else
320  {
321  for (int k = 0; k < dynamixel_ports_.size(); k++)
322  {
323  if ( dynamixel_ports_[k].joints.find(info.joint_name) != dynamixel_ports_[k].joints.end() )
324  {
325  ROS_ERROR("Cannot have multiple joints with the same name [%s]",
326  info.joint_name.c_str());
327  ROS_BREAK();
328  }
329  }
330  }
331  }
332 
333  //get joint initial position
334  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("init")) || (!servos[j]["init"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeInt) )
335  {
336  ROS_WARN("Invalid/Missing initial position for servo index %d, id: %d", i, info.id);
337  ROS_BREAK();
338  }
339  else
340  {
341  //store the servo's corresponding joint
342  info.init = static_cast<int>(servos[j]["init"]);
343  }
344 
345  //get joint default min position
346  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("min")) || (!servos[j]["min"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
347  {
348  ROS_WARN("Invalid/Missing min position for servo index %d, id: %d", i, info.id);
349  ROS_BREAK();
350  }
351  else
352  {
353  info.min = static_cast<int>(servos[j]["min"]);
354  }
355 
356  //get joint default max position
357  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("max")) || (servos[j]["max"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
358  {
359  ROS_WARN("Invalid/Missing max position for servo index %d, id: %d", i, info.id);
360  ROS_BREAK();
361  }
362  else
363  {
364  info.max = static_cast<int>(servos[j]["max"]);
365  }
366 
367  //get joint default joint speed (or set to global if none specified)
368  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("joint_speed")) ||
369  (!servos[j]["joint_speed"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
370  {
371  info.joint_speed = global_joint_speed;
372  }
373  else
374  {
375  info.joint_speed = static_cast<double>(servos[j]["joint_speed"]);
376  if (info.joint_speed < 0.0)
377  {
378  info.joint_speed = global_joint_speed;
379  }
380  }
381 
382 
383  //get joint torque limit (or set to global if none specified)
384  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("torque_limit")) ||
385  (!servos[j]["torque_limit"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
386  {
387  info.torque_limit = global_torque_limit;
388  }
389  else
390  {
391  info.torque_limit = static_cast<double>(servos[j]["torque_limit"]);
392  if ((info.torque_limit > 1.0) || (info.torque_limit < 0.0))
393  {
394  info.torque_limit = global_torque_limit;
395  }
396  }
397 
398  //get joint p_gain (or set to global if none specified)
399  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("p_gain")) ||
400  (!servos[j]["p_gain"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
401  {
402  info.p_gain = global_p_gain;
403  }
404  else
405  {
406  info.p_gain = static_cast<double>(servos[j]["p_gain"]);
407  if (info.p_gain < 0.0)
408  {
409  info.p_gain = global_p_gain;
410  }
411  }
412 
413  //get joint i_gain (or set to global if none specified)
414  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("i_gain")) ||
415  (!servos[j]["i_gain"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
416  {
417  info.i_gain = global_i_gain;
418  }
419  else
420  {
421  info.i_gain = static_cast<double>(servos[j]["i_gain"]);
422  if (info.i_gain < 0.0)
423  {
424  info.i_gain = global_i_gain;
425  }
426  }
427 
428  //get joint d_gain (or set to global if none specified)
429  if ( (!servos[j].hasMember("d_gain")) ||
430  (!servos[j]["d_gain"].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble) )
431  {
432  info.d_gain = global_d_gain;
433  }
434  else
435  {
436  info.d_gain = static_cast<double>(servos[j]["d_gain"]);
437  if (info.d_gain < 0.0)
438  {
439  info.d_gain = global_d_gain;
440  }
441  }
442 
443 
444  //Ping the servo to make sure that we can actually connect to it
445  //and that it is alive and well on our bus
446  if (port.driver->ping(info.id))
447  {
448  bool success = true;
449  info.model_number = 0;
450  bool t_e;
451  success &= port.driver->getModelNumber(info.id, info.model_number);
452 
453  //If valid motor, setup in operating mode
454  if ((success) || (info.model_number))
455  {
456 
457  //set up the lookup tables that we'll use later in the code
458  //to look up how to operate each joint
459  info.cpr = model_number2specs_[info.model_number].cpr;
460  info.gear_reduction = model_number2specs_[info.model_number].gear_reduction;
461  info.model_name = model_number2specs_[info.model_number].name;
462  info.torque_ratio = model_number2specs_[info.model_number].torque_ratio;
463  info.torque_enabled = false;
464 
465  //Display joint info
466  ROS_INFO("Joint Name: %s, ID: %d, Model: %s", info.joint_name.c_str(), info.id,
467  info.model_name.c_str());
468 
469  //maintain torque state in motor
470  port.driver->getTorqueEnabled(info.id, t_e);
471  port.driver->setTorqueEnabled(info.id, t_e);
472 
473  //check support for operating mode
474  if ((control_type_ == TORQUE_CONTROL) && (info.model_number == 29))
475  {
476  ROS_ERROR("Torque Control mode not available with MX-28, skipping");
477  continue;
478  }
479 
480  //check for valid motor series
481  if ( ((port.series == "MX") && (info.model_number > 320))
482  || ((port.series == "XM") && ((info.model_number < 350) || (info.model_number > 1020)))
483  || ((port.series == "PRO") && (info.model_number < 35072)) )
484  {
485  ROS_ERROR("Wrong series of dynamixel found, skipping");
486  continue;
487  }
488 
489  //set operating mode for the motor
490  if ( !port.driver->setOperatingMode(info.id, control_type_) )
491  {
492  //ROS_WARN("Failed to set operating mode for %s motor (id %d)", info.joint_name.c_str(),
493  // info.id);
494  }
495 
496  //set torque limit for the motor
497  //ROS_INFO("%f %f %d", info.torque_limit, info.torque_ratio,
498  // (int) (info.torque_limit * info.torque_ratio));
499  if ( !port.driver->setMaxTorque(info.id, (int) (info.torque_limit * info.torque_ratio)) )
500  {
501  ROS_WARN("Failed to set torque limit for %s motor (id %d)", info.joint_name.c_str(),
502  info.id);
503  }
504 
505  //angle limits are only relevant in position control mode
506  if (control_type_ == POSITION_CONTROL)
507  {
508  //set angle limits & direction
509  if (info.min > info. max)
510  {
511  if ( !port.driver->setAngleLimits(info.id, info.max, info.min) )
512  {
513  ROS_WARN("Failed to set angle limits for %s motor (id %d)", info.joint_name.c_str(),
514  info.id);
515  }
516  }
517  else
518  {
519  if ( !port.driver->setAngleLimits(info.id, info.min, info.max) )
520  {
521  ROS_WARN("Failed to set angle limits for %s motor (id %d)", info.joint_name.c_str(),
522  info.id);
523  }
524  }
525  }
526 
527  //set PID tuning
528  if (!port.driver->setPIDGains(info.id, control_type_, info.p_gain, info.i_gain, info.d_gain))
529  {
530  ROS_WARN("Failed to set PID tuning for %s motor (id %d)", info.joint_name.c_str(), info.id);
531  }
532 
533  //add joint to port
534  port.joints[info.joint_name] = info;
535 
536  }
537  else
538  {
539  ROS_ERROR("Failed to load model information for dynamixel id %d", info.id);
540  ROS_ERROR("Model Number: %d, Model Info: %d ", info.model_number, info.model_info);
541  if (model_number2specs_.find(info.model_number) != model_number2specs_.end())
542  ROS_ERROR("Info is in database");
543  else
544  ROS_ERROR("Info is not in database");
545  ROS_BREAK();
546  }
547  }
548  else
549  {
550  ROS_ERROR("Cannot ping dynamixel id: %d", info.id);
551  }
552 
553  }
554 
555  //add port only if dynamixels were found
556  if (port.joints.size() > 0)
557  {
558  //add port information to server
559  dynamixel_ports_.push_back(port);
560  }
561  else
562  {
563  ROS_ERROR("No dynamixels found on %s, %s will not be used", port.device.c_str(),
564  port.port_name.c_str());
565  }
566 
567  }
568 
569  //shutdown if no valid ports
570  if (dynamixel_ports_.size() == 0)
571  {
572  ROS_ERROR("No valid ports found, shutting_down_...");
573  ROS_BREAK();
574  }
575 
576  }
577  else
578  {
579  ROS_ERROR("No port details loaded to param server");
580  ROS_BREAK();
581  }
582 
583 
584 
585  //advertise the sensor feedback topic
586  joint_state_publisher_ = nh_->advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/hexapod/joint_states", 1);
587 
588  //advertise the debug topic
589  if (echo_joint_commands_)
590  {
591  debug_publisher_ = nh_->advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/writeDebug", 1);
592  }
593 
594  //Start listening to command messages
595  joint_state_subscriber_ = nh_->subscribe<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/desired_hexapod_joint_state",
596  1, &DynamixelController::jointStateCallback, this);
597 }
598 
599 
603 DynamixelController::~DynamixelController()
604 {
605 
606  ROS_INFO("shutting_down_ dynamixel_controller");
607 
608  shutting_down_ = false;
609  delete nh_;
610 
611  if (stop_motors_on_shutdown_)
612  {
613  for (int i = 0; i < dynamixel_ports_.size(); i++)
614  {
615  //Turn off all the motors
616  for (map<string, dynamixelInfo>::iterator iter = dynamixel_ports_[i].joints.begin();
617  iter != dynamixel_ports_[i].joints.end(); iter++)
618  {
619  dynamixel_ports_[i].driver->setTorqueEnabled(iter->second.id, 0);
620  printf("Torque disabled on %s joint\n", iter->first.c_str());
621  }
622  }
623  }
624 
625  for (int i = 0; i < dynamixel_ports_.size(); i++)
626  {
627  //Delete driver objects
628  delete dynamixel_ports_[i].driver;
629  }
630 
631 }
632 
633 
637 void DynamixelController::startBroadcastingJointStates()
638 {
639 
640  broadcast_timer_ = nh_->createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0 / publish_rate_),
641  &DynamixelController::publishJointStatesThreaded, this);
642 }
643 
644 
645 
646 
653 void DynamixelController::jointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState::ConstPtr &joint_commands)
654 {
655 
656  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(write_mutex_);
657  write_msg_ = *joint_commands;
658  write_ready_ = true;
659  lock.unlock();
660  if (echo_joint_commands_)
661  {
662  debug_publisher_.publish(joint_commands);
663  }
664 
665 }
666 
667 
672 void DynamixelController::publishJointStatesThreaded(const ros::TimerEvent& event)
673 {
674  //don't access the driver after its been cleaned up
675  if (shutting_down_)
676  return;
677 
678  std::vector<std::thread> threads;
679  sensor_msgs::JointState read_msg;
680  sensor_msgs::JointState reads[dynamixel_ports_.size()];
681 
682  //enable torque only once we start receiving commands
683  if (write_ready_ && first_write_)
684  {
685  //loop over every port
686  for (int i = 0; i < dynamixel_ports_.size(); i++)
687  {
688  //get every joint on that port
689  std::map<std::string, dynamixelInfo>::iterator it;
690  for(it = dynamixel_ports_[i].joints.begin(); it != dynamixel_ports_[i].joints.end(); it++)
691  {
692 
693  dynamixelInfo info = it->second;
694  int32_t priorPos = info.init;
695 
696  //this is to ensure that the motor is enabled at it's current position
697  dynamixel_ports_[i].driver->getPosition(info.id, priorPos);
698  dynamixel_ports_[i].driver->setPosition(info.id, priorPos);
699 
700  //enable motor torque
701  if (!dynamixel_ports_[i].driver->setTorqueEnabled(info.id, 1))
702  {
703  ROS_ERROR("failed to enable torque on motor %d", info.id);
704  }
705 
706  //if in position control mode we enable the default join movement speed (profile velocity)
707  if (control_type_ == POSITION_CONTROL)
708  {
709  int regVal = (int) ((double) (info.joint_speed) * (60/(2.0 * M_PI)) * info.gear_reduction);
710  dynamixel_ports_[i].driver->setProfileVelocity(info.id, regVal);
711  }
712 
713  ROS_INFO("Torque enabled on %s joint", it->first.c_str());
714  info.torque_enabled = true;
715 
716  }
717  }
718 
719  first_write_ = false;
720  }
721 
722  //spawn an IO thread for each additional port
723  for (int i = 1; i < dynamixel_ports_.size(); i++)
724  {
725  reads[i] = sensor_msgs::JointState();
726  std::thread readThread(&DynamixelController::multiThreadedIO, this, i, std::ref(reads[i]));
727  threads.push_back(move(readThread));
728  }
729 
730  //get messages for the first port
731  reads[0] = sensor_msgs::JointState();
732 
733  //keep the write message thread safe
734  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(write_mutex_);
735  sensor_msgs::JointState temp_msg = write_msg_;
736  write_ready_ = false;
737  lock.unlock();
738 
739  //perform the IO on the first port
740 
741  //perform write
742  multiThreadedWrite(0, temp_msg);
743 
744  //perform read
745  multiThreadedRead(0, reads[0]);
746 
747 
748  //loop and get port information (wait for threads in order if any were created)
749  for (int i = 0; i < dynamixel_ports_.size(); i++)
750  {
751 
752  if (i > 0)
753  {
754  threads[i-1].join();
755  }
756 
757  if (reads[i].name.size() == 0)
758  {
759  ROS_ERROR("No values passed back from %s thread", dynamixel_ports_[i].device.c_str());
760  }
761 
762  //append read values to published message
763  read_msg.name.insert(read_msg.name.end(), reads[i].name.begin(), reads[i].name.end());
764  read_msg.position.insert(read_msg.position.end(), reads[i].position.begin(), reads[i].position.end());
765  read_msg.velocity.insert(read_msg.velocity.end(), reads[i].velocity.begin(), reads[i].velocity.end());
766  read_msg.effort.insert(read_msg.effort.end(), reads[i].effort.begin(), reads[i].effort.end());
767 
768  }
769 
770  //timestamp
771  read_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
772 
773  //reset write flag
774  if (write_ready_)
775  {
776  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(write_mutex_);
777  write_ready_ = false;
778  lock.unlock();
779  }
780 
781  //publish joint states
782  joint_state_publisher_.publish(read_msg);
783 
784 }
785 
786 
792 void DynamixelController::multiThreadedIO(int port_num, sensor_msgs::JointState &read_msg)
793 {
794 
795  //keep the write message thread safe
796  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(write_mutex_);
797  sensor_msgs::JointState thread_write_msg = write_msg_;
798  lock.unlock();
799 
800  //perform write
801  multiThreadedWrite(port_num, thread_write_msg);
802 
803  //perform read
804  multiThreadedRead(port_num, read_msg);
805 
806 }
807 
808 
814 void DynamixelController::multiThreadedWrite(int port_num, sensor_msgs::JointState joint_commands)
815 {
816 
817  //get this threads port information
818  portInfo port = dynamixel_ports_[port_num];
819 
820  //booleans used to setup which parameters to write
821  bool has_pos = false, has_vel = false, has_torque = false;
822 
823  //figure out which values have been specified
824  if (joint_commands.position.size() > 0)
825  {
826  has_pos = true;
827  }
828  if (joint_commands.velocity.size() > 0)
829  {
830  has_vel = true;
831  }
832  if (joint_commands.effort.size() > 0)
833  {
834  has_torque = true;
835  }
836 
837  //vectors to store the calculated values
838  vector<int> ids, velocities, positions, torques;
839 
840  //loop and calculate the values for each specified joint
841  for (int i = 0; i < joint_commands.name.size(); i++)
842  {
843 
844  //lookup the information for that particular joint to be able to control it
845  std::map<std::string, dynamixelInfo>::iterator joint_it;
846  if ((joint_it = port.joints.find(joint_commands.name[i])) == port.joints.end()) {
847  //Joint not on this port, ignore
848  continue;
849  }
850 
851  //Retrieve dynamixel information
852  dynamixelInfo info = joint_it->second;
853 
854  //prepare data to be sent to the motor
855  ids.push_back(info.id);
856 
857  //calculate the position register value for the motor
858  if (has_pos)
859  {
860 
861  //used to bound positions to limits
862  int up_lim, dn_lim;
863 
864  //get radian position value
865  double rad_pos = joint_commands.position[i];
866 
867  //define our clamping limits to avoid exceeding safe joint angles
868  if (info.min > info.max)
869  {
870  rad_pos = -rad_pos;
871  up_lim = info.min;
872  dn_lim = info.max;
873  }
874  else
875  {
876  up_lim = info.max;
877  dn_lim = info.min;
878  }
879 
880  //convert from radians to motor encoder value
881  int pos = (int)(rad_pos / 2.0 / M_PI * info.cpr + 0.5) + info.init;
882 
883 
884  //clamp joint angle to be within safe limit
885  if (pos > up_lim)
886  {
887  pos = up_lim;
888  }
889  else if (pos < dn_lim)
890  {
891  pos = dn_lim;
892  }
893 
894  //push motor encoder value onto list
895  positions.push_back(pos);
896 
897  }
898 
899  //calculate the velocity register value for the motor
900  if (has_vel)
901  {
902 
903  //get rad/s value from message
904  double rad_s_vel = joint_commands.velocity[i];
905 
906  //clamp to joint speed limit
907  if (abs(rad_s_vel) > info.joint_speed) {
908 
909  rad_s_vel = (rad_s_vel < 0) ? (-info.joint_speed) : (info.joint_speed);
910 
911  }
912 
913  //convert to motor encoder value
914  int vel = (int) ((rad_s_vel * (60/(2.0 * M_PI)) * info.gear_reduction));
915 
916  //Velocity values serve 2 different functions, in velocity control mode their sign
917  //defines direction, however in position control mode their absolute value is used
918  //to set the profile velocity (how fast the motor moves to the specified position)
919  vel = abs(vel);
920 
921  //we also need to take an absolute value as each motor series handles negative inputs
922  //differently
923  if ((control_type_ == VELOCITY_CONTROL) && (rad_s_vel < 0))
924  {
925 
926  if (port.series == "MX")
927  {
928  vel = vel + 1024;
929  }
930 
931  else
932  {
933  vel = -vel;
934  }
935  }
936 
937  //push motor velocity value onto list
938  velocities.push_back(vel);
939  }
940 
941 
942  //calculate torque register values for the motor
943  if (has_torque)
944  {
945  //replace the below with proper code when you can figure out the units
946  double input_torque = joint_commands.effort[i];
947 
948  int torque = 0;
949 
950  if (info.torque_ratio != 0)
951  {
952  torque = (int) (input_torque * info.torque_ratio);
953 
954  if (torque < 0)
955  {
956  if (port.series == "MX")
957  {
958  torque = 1024 - torque;
959  }
960  }
961  }
962  torques.push_back(torque);
963  }
964 
965 
966  }
967 
968 
969  //use the multi-motor write functions to reduce the bandwidth required to command
970  //all the motors
971 
972  if ( control_type_ == POSITION_CONTROL )
973  {
974 
975  //set the profile velocities if they have been defined
976  if (has_vel)
977  {
978  vector< vector<int> > data;
979  for (int i = 0; i < ids.size(); i++)
980  {
981  vector<int> temp;
982  temp.push_back(ids[i]);
983  temp.push_back(velocities[i]);
984  data.push_back(temp);
985  }
986  port.driver->setMultiProfileVelocity(data);
987  }
988 
989  //send the positions to the motors
990  if (has_pos)
991  {
992  vector< vector<int> > data;
993  for (int i = 0; i < ids.size(); i++)
994  {
995  vector<int> temp;
996  temp.push_back(ids[i]);
997  temp.push_back(positions[i]);
998  data.push_back(temp);
999  }
1000  port.driver->setMultiPosition(data);
1001  }
1002  }
1003  else if ( control_type_ == VELOCITY_CONTROL && has_vel)
1004  {
1005 
1006  //set the velocity values for each motor
1007 
1008  vector< vector<int> > data;
1009  for (int i = 0; i < ids.size(); i++)
1010  {
1011  vector<int> temp;
1012  temp.push_back(ids[i]);
1013  temp.push_back(velocities[i]);
1014  data.push_back(temp);
1015  }
1016  port.driver->setMultiVelocity(data);
1017  }
1018  else if ( (control_type_ == TORQUE_CONTROL) && (has_torque) )
1019  {
1020 
1021  //set the torque values for each motor
1022 
1023  vector< vector<int> > data;
1024  for (int i = 0; i < ids.size(); i++)
1025  {
1026  vector<int> temp;
1027  temp.push_back(ids[i]);
1028  temp.push_back(torques[i]);
1029  data.push_back(temp);
1030  }
1031  port.driver->setMultiTorque(data);
1032  }
1033 
1034 }
1035 
1036 
1042 void DynamixelController::multiThreadedRead(int port_num, sensor_msgs::JointState &read_msg)
1043 {
1044 
1045 
1046  portInfo port = dynamixel_ports_[port_num];
1047  std::vector<int> *servo_ids = new std::vector<int>;
1048  std::map<int, std::vector<int32_t> > *responses = new std::map<int, std::vector<int32_t> >;
1049 
1050  //Iterate over all connected servos and add to list
1051  for (map<string, dynamixelInfo>::iterator iter = port.joints.begin(); iter != port.joints.end(); iter++)
1052  {
1053  servo_ids->push_back(iter->second.id);
1054  }
1055 
1056  //get state info back from all dynamixels
1057  if( port.driver->getBulkStateInfo(servo_ids, responses) ) {
1058 
1059  //Iterate over all connected servos and add to list
1060  for (map<string, dynamixelInfo>::iterator iter = port.joints.begin(); iter != port.joints.end(); iter++)
1061  {
1062  //joint name
1063  string joint_name = iter->first;
1064 
1065  //info struct
1066  dynamixelInfo info = iter->second;
1067 
1068  //response from dynamixel
1069  std::vector<int32_t> response = responses->at(info.id);
1070 
1071  //put joint name in message
1072  read_msg.name.push_back(joint_name);
1073 
1074  //POSITION VALUE
1075  //get position and convert to radians
1076  double rad_pos = (response[0] - info.init) / ((double) (info.cpr)) * 2 * M_PI;
1077  if (info.min > info.max)
1078  {
1079  rad_pos = -rad_pos;
1080  }
1081 
1082  //Put position in message
1083  read_msg.position.push_back(rad_pos);
1084 
1085 
1086  //VELOCITY VALUE
1087  int raw_vel = response[1];
1088 
1089  //handle the sign of the value based on the motor series
1090  if (port.series == "MX")
1091  {
1092  raw_vel = (response[1] & 0x3FF);
1093 
1094  if ((response[1] > 1023) && (info.max > info.min))
1095  {
1096  raw_vel = -raw_vel;
1097  }
1098  else if ((response[1] < 1023) && (info.max < info.min))
1099  {
1100  raw_vel = -raw_vel;
1101  }
1102  }
1103  else if (info.min > info.max)
1104  {
1105  raw_vel = -raw_vel;
1106  }
1107 
1108  //convert to rad/s
1109  double rad_s_vel = ((double) raw_vel) * ((2.0 * M_PI) / 60.0) / info.gear_reduction;
1110 
1111  //put velocity in message
1112  read_msg.velocity.push_back(rad_s_vel);
1113 
1114 
1115  //TORQUE EFFORT VALUE
1116  //convert raw value to fraction of max torque
1117  int raw_torque = response[2];
1118  double torque = 0;
1119 
1120  if (port.series == "MX")
1121  {
1122  torque = ((double) (response[2] & 0x3FF)) / info.torque_ratio;
1123 
1124  //check sign
1125  if (response[2] < 1023)
1126  {
1127  torque = 0.0 - torque;
1128  }
1129  }
1130  else
1131  {
1132  torque = ((double) (response[2]) / info.torque_ratio);
1133  }
1134 
1135  if (info.min > info.max)
1136  {
1137  torque = -torque;
1138  }
1139 
1140  //put effort in message
1141  read_msg.effort.push_back(torque);
1142  }
1143  }
1144  else
1145  {
1146  ROS_ERROR("READ FAILURE, UNABLE TO GET JOINT STATES ON PORT %s", port.device.c_str());
1147  }
1148 
1149  read_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
1150 
1151 }
1152 
1153 
1155 int main(int argc, char **argv)
1156 {
1157 
1158  ros::init(argc, argv, "dynamixel_controller");
1159 
1160  DynamixelController controller;
1161 
1162  //Initialize Timer callback, this starts the IO
1163  controller.startBroadcastingJointStates();
1164 
1165  //Use a multi threaded spinner to handle the timer based IO callback and
1166  //write topic subscriber callbacks simultaneously
1167  ros::MultiThreadedSpinner spinner(2);
1168  spinner.spin();
1169 
1170 }
